structure.unit: E IMPLEMENTATION OF FEDERAL HAZARDOUS MATERIALS PROGRAMS

law.catch_line: Claims to be filed with Board of Claims.
law.text: Any claims against the commission or committees or their members shall be filed with the State Board of Claims in accordance with KRS Chapter 44.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 226, sec. 75, effective July 15, 1998.
